sentences.sContent: There was no garage in sight, so I hitched a lift into town.
sentences.sCn: 附近没有汽车修理厂，于是我搭便车进了城。

synos.tran: 搭便车；钩住；套住；猛拉；使结婚
被钩住；急动；蹒跚；搭便车旅行；结婚

phrases.pCn: 顺利地，成功地，容易地；不停地

remMethod.val: hit(撞) + ch → 车子撞坏后， 渴望能搭便车 → 搭便车

words.tran: 搭便车的旅行者；顺便插入的广告

trans.tranOther: to get free rides from the drivers of passing cars by standing at the side of the road and putting a hand out with the thumb raised
